conversion_verification.notes: The 3D render successfully transforms the 2D floor plan into a volumetric isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection. Walls have consistent height and clear thickness. Interior volumes are well-defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity in room adjacencies and wall placement. Balcony railings and glass partitions are accurately translated.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D plan precisely, including the round dining table, rugs, and specific bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with logical lighting. Materials (wood, tile, glass) are clearly distinguishable.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of the utility/deck floor texture compared to the detailed hatching in the 2D plan.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that maintains nearly perfect layout fidelity with professional rendering quality.
